title: MSM Lying About Kenosha | Guests: Ken Cuccinelli & Burgess Owens | 8/27/20
description:
The media is trying hard to blame the Kenosha shooting on Trump, but reporters on the ground are making it very difficult. Acting DHS Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli discusses deploying the National Guard to Kenosha and the murder charges against the 17-year-old alleged shooter. Hurricane Laura brought the most destructive winds Louisiana has seen in 160 years. SHAREtogether founder Jaco Booyens and For Kids and Country founder Rebecca Friedrichs review the insane things now being taught in grade schools. Daily Caller chief video director Richie McGinniss witnessed the Kenosha shooting from just feet away and joins to tell the story. Former NFL star and congressional candidate Burgess Owens joins after his powerful RNC speech.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
